name: .TEMPLATE
summary: Learn about .TEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: To open a TEMPLATE file on a device with Apple Pages installed, either double-click (macOS) or tap (iOS) the file. Apple Pages will then ask whether you want to add the template to your Template Chooser, so you can select it from My Templates in the future, or just create a single new document using the template.
After opening a TEMPLATE file in the macOS version of Apple Pages, you can convert the document it contains to any of the following formats (by selecting File â†’ Export):
In the iCloud version of Pages, you can convert the document a TEMPLATE file contains to PDF, DOCX, or EPUB, by selecting the ... button and then Download a Copy....
